body:
SELECT   
  a/data[at0001]/items[at0077]/value as date_time_at_diagnosis
        FROM EHR e CONTAINS COMPOSITION c
  CONTAINS (EVALUATION a[openEHR-EHR-EVALUATION.problem_diagnosis.v1])
  WHERE a/data[at0001]/items[at0002]/value/defining_code/code_string matches {'C501'}
            LIMIT 1
        ORDER BY c /context/start_time/ value DESC
